name: Renovator
overview: A game developed by Simon Peterson that made it second place in the first TND SEUCK compo (2003), just finishing 2 points behind Cloud King. You are the renovator, stranded on an alien planet, it is up to you to hunt down the evil alien species and wipe out their deadly renovation project. Watch out because those evil aliens are very hostile and have plans of attack. If you encounter any mean aliens, your best bet will be to fire lasers at them.
